main event: A group of college freshmen in Southampton reported a sighting of a stationary blinking object changing color from white to red to green on 9 November 1966.
interesting points: The object emitted a square-shaped red discharge., One observer reported that the object spun in a circle and then disappeared to the north., The sighting was believed to be influenced by recent UFO publicity in the area., There were multiple reports from observers in the same group., The conclusion from the report indicated insufficient data for evaluation.
sighted object: a stationary blinking object changing colors
